 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִם‎</span><sub>22</sub> **preposition** ==with== (Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִם‎</span>: so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Syriac (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) and general Aramaic); — suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִמִּי‎</span> [[Dan.3.32|Dan 3:32]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִמָּךְ‎</span> [[Ezra.7.13|Ezra 7:13]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִמֵהּ‎</span> [[Dan.2.22|Dan 2:22]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִמְּהוֺן‎</span> [[Ezra.5.2|Ezra 5:2]] — 

**1. a.** ***together with***, [[Dan.2.18|Dan 2:18]]; [[Dan.2.43|Dan 2:43]]; [[Dan.7.13|Dan 7:13]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִםעֲֿנָנֵי שְׁמַיָּא‎</span>, [[Ezra.5.2|Ezra 5:2]] +; whose dwelling, portion, etc., is ***with*** [[Dan.2.11|Dan 2:11]]; [[Dan.2.22|Dan 2:22]]; [[Dan.4.12|Dan 4:12]]; [[Dan.5.21|Dan 5:21]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** to speak ***with*** [[Dan.6.22|Dan 6:22]], to make war with [[Dan.7.21|Dan 7:21]] to do with ( = ***towards***) [[Dan.3.32|Dan 3:32]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּי עֲבַד עִמִּי‎</span> (compare [[Ps.86.17|Ps 86:17]]), compare [[Ezra.6.8|Ezra 6:8]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שַׁוִּי עִם‎</span> to make like ***to*** [[Dan.6.21|Dan 6:21]]. 

**2.** of time, [[Dan.3.33|Dan 3:33]] = [[Dan.4.31|Dan 4:31]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִםדָּֿר וְדָר‎</span> (co-exists) ***with*** all generations (compare Biblical Hebrew **1 g**); [[Dan.7.2|Dan 7:2]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִםלֵֿילְיָא‎</span> ***during*** the night.
